task.title: Sort Project List
task.shortdesc: Sort the Project List in the Workspace window by name, date modified, or size.

step.cmd: To sort the Project List by name, click Name in the Sort by field of the Project List pane. To sort by date modified, click Modified. To sort projects by their size on disk, click Size.
step.stepresult: Your projects will appear in the Project List pane in the order specified.When sorting by name, projects that start with uppercase letters will be sorted before ones with lowercase letters.
